name: PCUS formed from PCUSA
description: Separation resulting in the Presbyterian Church in the United States.

name: OPC separated from PCUSA
description: Orthodox Presbyterian Church formed after separation.

name: PCA separated from PCUS
description: Presbyterian Church in America formed after separation.

name: UPCUSA formed by merger
description: Merger of PCUSA and UPCNA formed UPCUSA.

name: PC(USA) formed by merger
description: Merger of PCUS and UPCUSA formed PC(USA).
